item.text: The Lord said to Moses, “Say to the priests, the sons of Aaron—say to them: ‘For a dead person no priest is to defile himself among his people,

<st data-num="03588 0518">except</st> for his <st data-num="07607" class="">close relative</st> who is <st data-num="07138" class="">near</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him<n id="1" />—his <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>, his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, his <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>, his <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st>, his <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st>,

and his <st data-num="01330" class="">virgin</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st> who is <st data-num="07138" class="">near</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">has</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">husband</st>—he may <st data-num="02930" class="">defile</st> himself for her.

He must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02930" class="">defile</st> himself as a <st data-num="01167" class="">husband</st> among his <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> so as to <st data-num="02490" class="">profane</st> himself.<n id="1" />
Priests must not have a bald spot shaved on their head, they must not shave the corner of their beard, and they must not cut slashes in their body.
“‘They must be holy to their God, and they must not profane the name of their God, because they are the ones who present the Lord’s gifts, the food of their God. Therefore they must be holy.

They must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> a <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="02491" class="">defiled</st> by <st data-num="02181" class="">prostitution</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03808" class="">nor</st> are they to <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> a <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="01644" class="">divorced</st> from her <st data-num="0376" class="">husband</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="01931" class="">priest</st><n id="3" /> is <st data-num="06918" class="">holy</st> to his <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>.<n id="4" />
You must sanctify him because he presents the food of your God. He must be holy to you because I, the Lord who sanctifies you all, am holy.
If a daughter of a priest profanes herself by engaging in prostitution, she is profaning her father. She must be burned to death.

“‘The high priest—who is greater than his brothers, and on whose head the anointing oil is poured, and who has been ordained to wear the priestly garments—must neither dishevel the hair of his head nor tear his garments.

He must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">go</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">where</st> there is <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">person</st>;<n id="1" /> he must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02930" class="">defile</st> himself even for his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> or for his <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>.
He must not go out from the sanctuary and must not profane the sanctuary of his God, because the dedication of the anointing oil of his God is on him. I am the Lord.
<st data-num="01931" class="">He</st> must <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> a <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> who is a <st data-num="01331" class="">virgin</st>.<n id="1" />

He must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">marry</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="0490" class="">widow</st>, a <st data-num="01644" class="">divorced woman</st>, or <st data-num="02491" class="">one profaned</st> by <st data-num="02181" class="">prostitution</st>; he may <st data-num="03588 0518">only</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> a <st data-num="01330" class="">virgin</st> from his <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st><n id="2" /> as a <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>,
so that he does not profane his children among his people, for I am the Lord who sanctifies him.’”
The Lord spoke to Moses:

“<st data-num="01696" class="">Tell</st> <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st>, ‘<st data-num="03808" class="">No</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> from your <st data-num="02233" class="">descendants</st> throughout their <st data-num="01755" class="">generations</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">has</st> a <st data-num="03971" class="">physical flaw</st><n id="2" /> is to <st data-num="07126" class="">approach</st> to <st data-num="07126" class="">present</st> the <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st> of his <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="03588" class="">Certainly</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605 03808">no</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> has a <st data-num="03971" class="">physical flaw</st> is to <st data-num="07126" class="">approach</st>: a <st data-num="05787" class="">blind</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> one who is <st data-num="06455" class="">lame</st>, <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> one <st data-num="02763" class="">with a slit nose</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> who has a <st data-num="08311" class="">limb too long</st>,

<st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> has <st data-num="01961" class="">had</st> a <st data-num="07667" class="">broken</st> <st data-num="07272" class="">leg</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">arm</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="01384" class="">hunchback</st>, <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="01851" class="">dwarf</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> one with a <st data-num="08400" class="">spot</st> in his <st data-num="05869" class="">eye</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="01618" class="">festering eruption</st>, <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="03217" class="">feverish rash</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="04790" class="">crushed</st> <st data-num="0810" class="">testicle</st>.

No man from the descendants of Aaron the priest who has a physical flaw may step forward to present the Lord’s gifts; he has a physical flaw, so he must not step forward to present the food of his God.

He may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> both the <st data-num="06944" class="">most</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> and the <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st> of his <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>,
but he must not go near the special curtain or step forward to the altar because he has a physical flaw. Thus he must not profane my holy places, for I am the Lord who sanctifies them.’”
So Moses spoke these things to Aaron, his sons, and all the Israelites.
